ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank Dr. Maria T. Spinato and Dr. Davor Ojkic (Animal Health Laboratory, University of Guelph, Canada) for their protocol for RNA extraction from FFPE tissue, as well as Hansueli Fahrni (Bern Animal Park, Bern, Switzerland) for providing faecal samples of muskoxen. They are also indebted to M.Sc. Stefano Bagatella and Prof. Anna Oevermann (Vetsuisse Faculty, University of Bern, Switzerland) for their neuropathological expertise. Finally, they are grateful to Lucienne Boujon (Institute of Social and Preventive Medicine, Lausanne University Hospital, Switzerland) for proofreading the manuscript.

sec.title: Prior publication
sec.p: Data have not been published previously.
